CustomField.description: Patient journey milestone for Status = Discontinued
CustomField.formula: CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Status__c, "Discontinued", CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Sub_Status__c, "Requirement Not Met - Patient Residency","OB", "Unable to reach Patient on required contact, Max Attempts","OB", "Unable to reach Prescriber on required contact, Max Attempts","OB", "Patient Decision - Alternate Therapy","OB", "Patient Decision - Financial","OB", "Patient Decision - MyRare Only","OB", "Patient Decision - Other","OB", "Prescriber Decision - Alternate Therapy","OB", "Prescriber Decision - Financial","OB", "Prescriber Decision - Coverage Effort","OB", "Prescriber Decision - Other","OB", "Patient Medical Delay, Max Delay","OB", "No Route of Access","OB", "Patient Deceased","OB", "Patient Off Therapy","OB", "Other","OB", null), null)
CustomField.label: Milestone - Discontinued
